title: Drosophila brain: entire alpha and alpha' lobes of a mushroom body

sample.description: Drosophila mushroom body: The largest tissue sample imaged at 4-nm voxels to date (2021). Entire alpha and alpha' lobes of a 5 day-old adult female  (Genome type: iso Canton S G1 x w1118 iso 5905)
sample.protocol: Chemical Fixation, ORTO-Lead-EPTA staining via progressive lowering of temperature and low temperature staining (PLT-LTS) heavy metal enhancement protocol.
sample.contributions: Sample provided by Zhiyuan Lu (HHMI/Janelia), prepared for imaging by Song Pang (HHMI/Janelia), with imaging by Song Pang (HHMI/Janelia) and C. Shan Xu (HHMI/Janelia), and post-processing by C. Shan Xu (HHMI/Janelia).
